heroes.smallBio: A highly experienced Front-End Developer with 10 years of expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces using modern web standards and accessibility best practices. Skilled in a range of technologies such as HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, GSAP, and Handlebars. Dedicated to improving website performance and user experience while maintaining the highest coding standards. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions for diverse clients in the Latin American and European markets.
